questiontext.text:
Below is the (incomplete) ANOVA table of a CRD-ANOVA (Completely Randomized Design ANOVA), which was performed on data that were collected from 16 individuals divided into 4 groups.

————— —– —- —- —– Source of variation SS df MS F Among groups 8.0 Within groups 60 12 Total 180 ————— —– —- —- —–

For testing H0: μ1 = μ2 = μ3 = μ4 against H1: not all population averages are equal the F value from the ANOVA table is compared with the critical value from the F-distribution. At a risk of 5%, the conclusion should be

feedback.text: Critical value is 3.13, reject H0…: Incorrect

answer.text: Critical value is 3.49, do not reject H0.

feedback.text: Critical value is 3.49, do not reject H0…: Incorrect
Critical value is 3.49, reject H0…: Correct

answer.text: Critical value is 8.74, do not reject H0.

feedback.text: Critical value is 8.74, do not reject H0…: Incorrect
